Welcome to my personal piece of internet, in which I share some stuff about the research works I'm doing and my favorite topics.

If someone asks me to introduce myself, I will say that my name is Mojtaba, and I'm so much nerdy about the computational world. To go further, I can say I live currently in Eindhoven, the Netherlands, and work as a PostDoc researcher at TU/e in the field of Computational Chemistry. Before joining TU/e, I was a PhD candidate at KU Leuven, Belgium, in the field of Computational Biomedical Engineering.

If you are interested in computer simulations and computational modeling, in addition to the materials that you will find in this website, you may also be interested in having a look at TuxRiders, a personal project I started to share mathematical and computational modeling experiences.
